narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "C" license.  
The license fee of $30.00 should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
The pre-licensing process must be completed including fees paid by December 19, 2018 or the applicant will forfeit
the application fee and will be required to wait 6 months to reapply. No regulated activity may be conducted until a
valid USDA license is obtained.
The inspection and exit briefing conducted with the Director.
